content: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/80823 looks like a reasonable request to me, but it's sufficiently off the beaten path that I think it'd be worth spending 5 minutes on in the next libs meeting. It's already tagged I-needs-decision, and I'd be happy to summarize in the next meeting (if folks don't end up looking at it before then).
yeah i usually use I-nominated for that. might be good to leave a comment so the author knows what's up. alternatively you can just ping the whole team on that pr to get some more opinions.

yeah, please ping the team when you want their input. it is difficult-to-impossible for me to make the actual meetings, and putting our thoughts into the tracker gives more of an opportunity for folks outside of the team to respond as well.
